text: Chúfēi tāmen táo dào céng yǔ nǐmen dìyuē de mínzhòng nàlǐ, huò lái guīshùn nǐmen, jì bù yuàn duì nǐmen zuòzhàn, yòu bù yuàn duì tāmen de zōngzú zuòzhàn. Jiǎruò zhēnzhǔ yìyù, tā bì shǐ tāmen zhàn yōushì, ér tāmen bì jìngōng nǐmen. Rúguǒ tāmen tuìbì nǐmen, ér bù jìngōng nǐmen, bìngqiě tóuxiáng nǐmen, nàme, zhēnzhǔ jué bùxǔ nǐmen jìngōng tāmen
